DOC.brief_summary: DA-6886_IBS_I phase I , dose block-randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled , single/multiple dosing , dose escalation clinical trial open-labelled food effect study single dose investigate safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics DA-6886 oral administration healthy male subject .
DOC.brief_title: Phase I Clinical Trial DA-6886 Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: 20 ~ 45 year old 27kg/m2 ≥ BMI ≥ 20kg/m2 Healthy Male Informed consent Clinically significant medical history smoker Clinically significant hypersensitivity Drugs Clinically significant cutaneous disorder QTcB > 450msec history drug abuse show positive drug abuse cotinine urine screening
